001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007
008/**
009 * Marks a test method or class for post-execution cleanup.
010 *
011 * <p>This annotation is used to specify cleanup actions that should be executed after a test completes.
012 * The framework processes this annotation through the {@code RipperMan} extension,
013 * ensuring that necessary tear down operations, such as deleting test data or closing resources, are performed.
014 *
015 * <p>The specified targets correspond to predefined cleanup actions,
016 * which are resolved dynamically and executed after the test method finishes.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
021@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD})
022public @interface Ripper {
023
024   /**
025    * Defines the cleanup actions to be performed after test execution.
026    *
027    * <p>Each target represents a predefined cleanup operation that is dynamically resolved
028    * and executed once the test method has completed.
029    *
030    * @return An array of target identifiers specifying cleanup actions.
031    */
032   String[] targets();
033
034}
